price: Ergasii "inni kun isa isin sobsiisaa turtan" jedhama.
arabic: ثُمَّ يُقَالُ هَٰذَا ٱلَّذِي كُنتُم بِهِۦ تُكَذِّبُونَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: thumma yuqālu hādhā alladhī kuntum bihi tukadhibūna
